abstract: Obama administration, in a move that could open up more transcripts of historically significant grand jury testimony from many years ago, is proposing to change a rule that imposes strict and permanent secrecy requirements on such records.
snippet: The plan would change a rule that imposes strict and permanent secrecy on the transcripts.
lead_paragraph: The plan would change a rule that imposes strict and permanent secrecy on the transcripts.

headline.main: U.S. Urges Opening Up Old Grand Jury Records
headline.print_headline: U.S. Urges Opening Up Old Grand Jury Records
headline.seo: Historic Grand Jury Records May Be Opened Up
